title: Fps issues
body:
Hello there.

Now before starting this off I want to state that I do realise you guys get a whole lot of questions like this but after trying many solutions found online this is my last chance at getting the game to function properly.

Alright,So I played league around 2 months earlier on this same computer having my fps around 60,with medium high settings and the highest resolution.After patching the game yesterday and getting into a normal game I was greeted with 13 fps.After lowering all my settings I got barely 30 frames with occasional drops.

I would really appreciate getting some help here,thanks alot!

replies.body: I wonder if maybe you missed a driver update during the time that you weren't playing. Double check for any driver updates really quickly and go ahead and run through the steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to cover the rest of the basics. Hit me back up if that's not helping at all and we can dig a little further!
